tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW v_indicator_targetvalue; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_indicator_targetvalue AS SELECT con.activity_id AS amp_activity_id, val.value AS name, ind.indicator_id AS me_indicator_id, si.amp_sector_id AS me_indicator_sector_id, CASE ind.type WHEN 'A' THEN 1 :: BIGINT WHEN 'D' THEN 2 :: BIGINT ELSE 3 :: BIGINT END AS me_indicator_type_id, aux.log_frame_id AS me_indicator_logframe_id, aux.risk_rating_id AS me_indicator_risk_id FROM amp_indicator_connection con JOIN amp_indicator ind ON ind.indicator_id = con.indicator_id LEFT JOIN amp_sector_indicator si ON si.indicator_id=ind.indicator_id JOIN amp_indicator_connection_aux aux ON con.id=aux.indicator_connection_id JOIN amp_indicator_values val ON val.ind_connect_id = con.id WHERE val.value_type = 0 AND con.sub_clazz::text = 'a'::text;
